_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: Other Farm Product Raw Material Merchant Wholesalers

_exec_summary.SummaryText: PROPER SAFETY EQUIPMENT IS PROVIDED TO ALL CUSTOMERS. SAFETY EQUIPMENT IS EXPLAINED TO EACH CUSTOMER, AND IF REQUESTED, ONE OF OUR EMPLOYEES WILL GO WITH CUSTOMER TO POINT OF APPLICATION AND ASSIST THEM AND EXPLAIN FURTHER. OUR FACILITY IS LOCATED ON A 5 ACRE GRAVELED AREA. A 30,000 GALLON ANHYDROUS AMMONIA STORAGE TANK, 30 NURSE TANKS, AND TOOL BARS ARE LOCATED HERE. ALSO, WE HANDLE ANHYDROUS AMMONIA ONLY. OUR FACILITY IS EQUIPPED WITH 2 FRESH WATER TANKS AND 24 HOUR SECURITY LIGHTING. THERE IS ALSO A SMALL BUILDING LOCATED HERE CONTAINING TOOLS, PARTS, AND SAFETY EQUIPMENT. OUR PERSONAL RESIDENCE IS LOCATED ACROSS THE ROAD FROM OUR FACILITY. WE HAVE A 30,000 GALLON STORAGE TANK WHICH IS NEVER TO BE FILLED MORE THAN 85% CAPACITY. AS PER DEPT OF AGRICULTURE REGULATIONS, SIGHT GAUGES ARE PRESENT ON ALL EQUIPMENT. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROVIDER IS LOCATED WITHIN 1 MILE OF OUR FACILITY. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT IS EQUIPPED WITH LONG-RANGE SPRAY CAPABILITIES AND PROPER EMERGENCY EQUIPMENT. IN ADDITION, THE ROAD GOING BY OUR FACILITY CAN BE BLOCKED OFF IN EACH DIRECTION FOR UP TO 1/2 MILE EITHER SIDE. THE FIRE DEPARTMENT AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROVIDERS CAN BE NOTIFIED IMMEDIATELY AND RESPONSE WOULD BE WITHIN MINUTES WITH EVACUATION IF NECESSARY. WE HAVE NOT HAD ANY ACCIDENTS TO DATE. WE HAVE A PROGRAM OF CONSTANT MONITORING AND MAINTENANCE OF ALL EQUIPMENT WITH SAFETY AS THE TOP PRIORITY. WE PLAN TO HAVE ATLEAST YEARLY SAFETY AND INFORMATIONAL MEETINGS WITH EMERGENCY PROVIDERS AND INVITE CUSTOMERS TO ATTEND. OUR EMPLOYEES ARE INVOLVED IN REGULAR SAFETY TALKS AND IN MAINTENANCE MEETINGS.
